https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ucEn4Va7F7JukT65SmpArxece9l.jpg Fidelis Cloer is a self-confessed war profiteer who found The Perfect War when the US invaded Iraq. It wasn't about selling a dozen cars, or even a hundred, it was a thousand-car war where security would become the ultimate product. Bulletproof Salesman
